definition: the quality of movability by virtue of being free from attachment or other restraints
details:
noun
- the quality of movability by virtue of being free from attachment or other restraints
- a lack of strict accuracy
- freedom from restraint
= example: freedom from restraint
- frequent and watery bowel movements
= synonyms: looseness of the bowels
- dissolute indulgence in sensual pleasure
= synonyms: dissolution
- movement or space for movement
= synonyms: play
